entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
